00044 class ModelFileValidCheck : public RegressionCheck
00045 {
00046 
00047 private:
00048   std::string  m_modelFile;
00049   std::string  m_outFile;
00050   bool  m_invalidCheck;
00051   
00052 public:
00053   ModelFileValidCheck(const std::string &modelFile, const std::string outFile, bool testInvalid = false) :
00054     m_modelFile(modelFile), m_outFile(outFile), m_invalidCheck(testInvalid) {
00055     m_Name = modelFile;
00056   }
00057 
00058   virtual ~ModelFileValidCheck() {}
00059 
00060   bool check(std::string & msg) {
00061     //AxiomGT1.snp-posteriors.txt valid model file detected.
00062     Verbose::out(1, m_modelFile + " check...", false);
00063     std::ifstream results;
00064     std::string validTest = "valid model file detected.";
00065     std::string invalidTest = "not a recognized model file.";
00066     Fs::aptOpen(results, m_outFile);
00067     std::string line;
00068     char buf[BUFSIZ];
00069     results.getline(buf, BUFSIZ);
00070     line = ToStr(buf);
00071     bool valid = true;
00072     while(valid && !line.empty()) {
00073       if(line.find(m_modelFile) != std::string::npos) {
00074         if(m_invalidCheck) {
00075           if(line.find(invalidTest) == std::string::npos) {
00076             valid = false;
00077           }
00078         } else if(line.find(validTest) == std::string::npos) {
00079           valid = false;
00080         }
00081       }
00082       results.getline(buf, BUFSIZ);
00083       line = ToStr(buf);
00084     }
00085     results.close();
00086 
00087     if(valid) {
00088       Verbose::out(1, "ok");
00089     } else {
00090       Verbose::out(1, "failed");
00091     }
00092     return valid;
00093   }
00094 
00095 };
00096 
00097 class ModelFileHeaderCheck : public RegressionCheck
00098 {
00099 
00100   std::string  m_outDir;
00101   std::string  m_logFile;
00102   std::string  m_libFile;
00103   std::string  m_goldFile;
00104   std::string  m_generatedFile;
00105   
00106 public:
00107 
00108   ModelFileHeaderCheck(const std::string outDir, const std::string logFile,  const std::string &libFile, const std::string gold, std::string gen) :
00109     m_outDir(outDir), m_logFile( logFile ), m_libFile(libFile), m_goldFile(gold), m_generatedFile(gen) {
00110     m_Name = Fs::basename(libFile);
00111   }
00112 
00113   virtual ~ModelFileHeaderCheck() {}
00114 
00115   bool check(std::string & msg) {
00116 
00117     std::string ignoreFile = m_outDir + "/ignore.txt";
00118     Fs::rm(m_logFile, false);
00119     Fs::convertToUncPathInPlace(m_generatedFile,10);
00120 
00121     std::string cmd =
00122       "./apt-snp-model-converter --input-file " +  m_libFile +
00123       " --log-file " + m_logFile + 
00124       " --dump-headers GTC4.1 > \"" + m_generatedFile + "\" 2>" + ignoreFile;
00125 
00126     int retVal = system(Fs::convertCommandToUnc(cmd).c_str());
00127     if(retVal != 0) {
00128       Verbose::warn(1, ToStr(" ") + cmd + " Failed to run command.", "\nERROR: ");
00129       return false;
00130     }
00131 
00132     TextFileCheck textCheck(m_generatedFile, m_goldFile, 0);
00133     std::string checkMsg = m_libFile + " validated GTC4.1 headers.";
00134     bool checkRv = textCheck.check(checkMsg);
00135     if ( checkRv ) {
00136       Verbose::out(1, checkMsg);
00137     }
00138     else {
00139       Verbose::warn(1, checkMsg, "\nERROR: ");
00140     }
00141     return checkRv;
00142   }
00143 
00144 };

00146 class SnpModelConverterTest
00147 {
00148 
00149 public:
00150   int numPassed, numFailed;
00151   std::string testDir;
00152   SnpModelConverterTest() {
00153     numPassed = 0;
00154     numFailed = 0;
00155   }
00156 
00157   void qt_doModelInvalid(const std::string & outDir);
00158   void qt_doModelValid(const std::string & outDir);
00159   void qt_doModelHeaders(const std::string & outDir);
00160 };
00161 
00162 void SnpModelConverterTest::qt_doModelValid(const std::string & outDir)
00163 {
00164 
00165   std::string name = "qt-doModelValid";
00166   std::string testDir = Fs::join(outDir, name);
00167   Fs::mkdir(testDir, false);
00168   std::string logFile = Fs::join(testDir, name + ".log");
00169   Fs::rm(logFile, false);
00170   std::string ignoreFile = Fs::join(testDir, "ignore.txt");
00171   
00172   std::vector< std::string > modelFiles;
00173   const std::string modelFilesListing = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/snp-model-converter/qt-doModelValid_test.txt";
00174   APT_ERR_ASSERT(affx::TsvFile::extractColToVec(modelFilesListing, "model-files",
00175                  &modelFiles) == affx::TSV_OK,
00176                  modelFilesListing + std::string(" invalid file column header 'model-files' is required."));
00177   std::string command = std::string("./apt-snp-model-converter --model-files ") +
00178                         modelFilesListing  + " --out-dir " + testDir + " --log-file " + logFile +
00179                         " > " + ignoreFile + " 2>&1 ";
00180 
00181   std::vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00182 
00183   for(int i = 0; i < modelFiles.size(); i++) {
00184     if(Fs::fileExists(modelFiles[i])) {
00185       checks.push_back(new ModelFileValidCheck(modelFiles[i], logFile));
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00190   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00191   if(!test.pass()) {
00192     Verbose::out(1, "Error in SnpModelConverterTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00193     numFailed++;
00194   } else {
00195     numPassed++;
00196   }
00197 }
00198 
00199 void SnpModelConverterTest::qt_doModelInvalid(const std::string & outDir)
00200 {
00201 
00202   std::string name = "qt-doModelInvalid";
00203   std::string testDir = Fs::join(outDir, name);
00204   Fs::mkdir(testDir, false);
00205   std::string logFile = Fs::join(testDir, name + ".log");
00206   Fs::rm(logFile, false);
00207   std::string ignoreFile = Fs::join(testDir, "ignore.txt");
00208 
00209   std::vector< std::string > invalidFiles;
00210   const std::string invalidFilesListing = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/snp-model-converter/qt-doModelInvalid_test.txt";
00211   APT_ERR_ASSERT(affx::TsvFile::extractColToVec(invalidFilesListing, "model-files",
00212                  &invalidFiles) == affx::TSV_OK,
00213                  invalidFilesListing + std::string(" invalid file column header 'model-files' is required."));
00214   std::string command = std::string("./apt-snp-model-converter --model-files ") +
00215                         invalidFilesListing  + " --out-dir " + testDir + " --log-file " + logFile +
00216                         " > " + ignoreFile + " 2>&1 ";
00217 
00218   std::vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00219 
00220   for(int i = 0; i < invalidFiles.size(); i++) {
00221     if(Fs::fileExists(invalidFiles[i])) {
00222       checks.push_back(new ModelFileValidCheck(invalidFiles[i], logFile, true));
00223     }
00224   }
00225 
00226   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00227   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00228   if(!test.pass()) {
00229     Verbose::out(1, "Error in SnpModelConverterTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00230     numFailed++;
00231   } else {
00232     numPassed++;
00233   }
00234 }
00235 
00236 void SnpModelConverterTest::qt_doModelHeaders(const std::string & outDir)
00237 {
00238 
00239   std::string name = "qt-doModelHeaders";
00240   std::string testDir = Fs::join(outDir, name);
00241   Fs::mkdir(testDir, false);
00242   std::string logFile = Fs::join(outDir, name + ".log");
00243 
00244 
00245   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00246   tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00247   std::string testFiles = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/snp-model-converter/qt-doModelHeaders_test.tsv";
00248   APT_ERR_ASSERT(tsv.open(testFiles) == affx::TSV_OK, testFiles + " unable to open");
00249 
00250   std::string libPath, goldPath, generatedPath;
00251   tsv.bind(0, "lib_path", &libPath, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00252   tsv.bind(0, "results_path", &goldPath, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00253 
00254   std::vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00255   while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00256     checks.push_back(new ModelFileHeaderCheck(testDir, logFile, libPath, goldPath,
00257                      testDir + "/" + Fs::basename(goldPath)));
00258   }
00259 
00260   tsv.clear();
00261   
00262   std::string command = "echo Running apt-snp-model-converter per lib file...";
00263   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00264 
00265   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00266   if(!test.pass()) {
00267     Verbose::out(1, "Error in SnpModelConverterTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00268     numFailed++;
00269   } else {
00270     numPassed++;
00271   }
00272 }
00273 
00274 /** Everybody's favorite function. */
00275 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00276 {
00277   try {
00278     FsTestDir testDir;
00279     testDir.setTestDir("chipstream/snp-model-converter-qt", true);
00280     
00281     SnpModelConverterTest test;
00282     test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00283     
00284     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00285 
00286     test.qt_doModelInvalid(test.testDir);
00287     test.qt_doModelValid(test.testDir);
00288     test.qt_doModelHeaders(test.testDir);
00289     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed));
00290     return test.numFailed != 0;
00291   } catch(...) {
00292     Verbose::out(1, "Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00293     return 1;
00294   }
00295   return 1;
00296 }
